___UsedInstances.description: The number of ExecutionEnvironment instances in use

___VirtualMachine.description: True if the ExecutionEnvironment is a virtual machine

___UnavailableInstances.description: The number of ExecutionEnvironment instances that are unavailable

___CPUModel.description: The model of the CPU, as defined by the vendor

___BenchmarkID.description: ID(s) of Benchmarks associated with this ExecutionEnvironment

___TotalInstances.description: The total number of ExecutionEnvironment instances

___OSName.description: The specific name of the operating system - OSName_t (open enumeration)

___OSFamily.description: The general family of the operating system - OSFamily_t (open enumeration)

___OSVersion.description: The version of the operating system, as defined by the vendor

___MainMemorySize.description: The total amount of physical RAM in one ExecutionEnvironment instance (MB)

___LogicalCPUs.description: The number of logical CPUs in one ExecutionEnvironment instance

___NetworkInfo.description: The types of internal network connections between ExecutionEnvironments - NetworkInfo_t (open enumeration)

___ApplicationEnvironmentID.description: ID(s) of ApplicationEnvironments available in this ExecutionEnvironment

___CPUTimeScalingFactor.description: The factor used by the ComputingManager to scale the CPU time limit

___WallTimeScalingFactor.description: The factor used by the ComputingManager to scale the wallclock time limit

___ConnectivityOut.description: True if direct outbound network connectiity is available to a running job

___CPUVendor.description: The name of the manufacturer of the CPU

___ConnectivityIn.description: True if direct inbound network connectiity is available to a running job

___PhysicalCPUs.description: The number of physical CPUs in one ExecutionEnvironment instance

___CPUVersion.description: The specific version name of the CPU, as defined by the vendor

___CPUClockSpeed.description: The clock speed of the CPU (MHz)

___VirtualMemorySize.description: The total amount of virtual memory (RAM+swap) in one ExecutionEnvironment instance (MB)

___CPUMultiplicity.description: Information about the CPUs and cores in an execution environment
